com.neovisionaries.jdo

Class TaskExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neovisionaries.jdo.TaskExecutor

  • public class TaskExecutor
extends Object
    Task executor. 
     // Persistence manager factory.
 PersistenceManagerFactory factory = ...;

 // Create a task executor.
 TaskExecutor executor = new TaskExecutor(factory);

 // Create a task.
 Task task = new Task() {
     @Override
     public Object run(PersistenceManager manager) {
         ......
     }
 };

 // Execute the task.
 executor.execute(task, true, 2);
    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Takahiko Kawasaki

      • TaskExecutor

        public TaskExecutor(javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory factory)
        Constructor with a persistence manager factory.

        factory - A persistence manager factory. Must not be null.
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Object execute(Task task)
        Execute a task.

        This method is an alias of execute(task, false, 0).

        Parameters:
        task - Task to be executed.
        Returns:
        The object returned from task.run(PersistenceManager).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - task is null.
        javax.jdo.JDOException - A persistence manager could not be obtained or the task failed. See the description of execute(Task, boolean, int) for details.

      • execute

        public Object execute(Task task,
             boolean transaction)
        Execute a task.

        This method is an alias of execute(task, transaction, 0).

        Parameters:
        task - Task to be executed.
        transaction - true to execute the task in a transaction.
        Returns:
        The object returned from task.run(PersistenceManager).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - task is null.
        javax.jdo.JDOException - A persistence manager could not be obtained or the task failed. See the description of execute(Task, boolean, int) for details.

      • execute

        public Object execute(Task task,
             boolean transaction,
             int retryCount)
        Execute a task.
        Parameters:
        task - Task to be executed.
        transaction - true to execute the task in a transaction.
        retryCount - Indicates how many times to retry the task. The task is retried only when task.run(PersistenceManager) threw a JDOCanRetryException. If an exception of other type was thrown, the task is not retried.
        Returns:
        The object returned from task.run(PersistenceManager).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - task is null, or retryCount is less than 0.
        javax.jdo.JDOException - There are several cases for this exception.
        • Failed to get a persistence manager from the persistence manager factory.
        • getPersistenceManager() of the persistence manager factory returned null.
        • The task continued to throw JDOCanRetryException and exceeded the retry count.
        RuntimeException - The task continued to throw JDOCanRetryException and exceeded the retry count.
